title: Discovery Call
description: Initial call to discuss CRM requirements and current pain points. Client mentioned need for better reporting and team collaboration features.

title: Follow-up Email
description: Sent detailed proposal document and pricing information. Included custom reporting examples they requested.

title: Product Demo
description: Conducted 45-minute product demonstration focusing on automation features. Great engagement from their technical team.

title: Prepare Custom Quote
description: Create customized pricing proposal based on their specific requirements for 25 users with advanced reporting module.

title: Contract Discussion
description: Discussed contract terms and implementation timeline. Minor adjustments requested to payment schedule.

title: Client Feedback
description: Client provided positive feedback on proposal. Requested minor changes to implementation timeline to accommodate their busy Q1 schedule.

title: Introduction Email
description: Initial outreach email sent with company overview and case studies relevant to their industry.

title: Requirements Review
description: In-depth session to review technical requirements and integration needs with their existing systems.
